boardgame.name: Drakon (3. Edition)
Drakon (third edition)
דראקון
boardgame.description: The old dragon Drakon has captured a brave band of adventurers who have sneaked into her lair to steal her gold. But rather than eat them immediately, Drakon has decided to make it a game: Greed shall set one of the adventurers free. She sends the frightened adventurers into her magical, mad vaulted chambers, and the first one to collect ten gold from Drakon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s maze gets to go free. The rest get to be lunch._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each turn, players must choose one of two options: (1) place a tile from their hand onto the board, expanding the dungeon; or (2) move their Hero to an adjacent tile. Many of the dungeon tiles have an icon that allows players entering that space to take a special action (for example, taking a piece of gold from the dragon's hoard, stealing gold from another player, or destroying a tile that is already in play)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is the third edition of Drakon, and includes the following updates:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; plastic miniatures are used for the heroes and the Drakon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; new tiles are larger (measuring 2.5 by 2.5 inches) and have all new artwork_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; tiles include a combination of rooms from Drakon (second edition) and Drakon Expansion 1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; new rules, variants, and player aids are provided_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; each gold piece now has a value between 1 and 3_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the basic game, the first player to earn 10 gold wins the game. Some variants provide different winning conditions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game last between 20 and 60 minutes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Thank you, Jeremy, Jennifer, and Family J and J Board Games

New/sealed item! Fast shipping! Pay via paypal to maydaygames@gmail.com or save 2% by paying to existingfunds@sphiatt.com instead with existing paypal funds. Buyer to pay just $6.95 shipping! Yes we can combine shipping on multiple items! Save even more! Yes we can combine orders at significant shipping discounts. Please paypal payments to maydaygames@gmail.com. Be SURE you include what item you are buying with the payment. Combined shipping works as follows for domestic (48 lower states) orders: Highest price shipping item: Full shipping cost 2nd-4th highest priced items: 50% off shipping cost for each of these items. 5th-10th highest priced shipping items: 60% off shipping costs for each of these items. 11th+ highest priced shipping items: 75% off shipping for all the rest of the items. As an example say you purchased 15 games, 3 of them with $10 shipping, 5 of them with $8 shipping and 7 of them with $4 shipping. The total shipping for the 15 items would be: Full shipping on the first item: $10.00 50% off shipping on items 2-4: $14.00 (50% off $10, $10 and $8, the next highest shipping cost items) 60% off shipping on items 5-10: $14.40 (60% off of 3 items at $8 shipping and 3 more items at $4 shipping = $36) 75% off shipping on items 11-15: $4.00 (75% off 4 items at $4) Total shipping on these 15 items then would be $10+$14+$14.40 + $4 = $42.40 shipping. This is just an example and your results will vary depending on what you buy of course!

Fantasy Flight Games - Drakon 3rd Edition Language: English Players: 2 to 6 Age: 10+ Duration: 20 to 60 min Weight: 1.000 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: The old dragon Drakon has captured a brave band of adventurers who have sneaked into her lair to steal her gold. But rather than eat them immediately, Drakon has decided to make it a game: Greed shall set one of the adventurers free. She sends the frightened adventurers into her magical, mad vaulted chambers, and the first one to collect ten gold from Drakon’s maze gets to go free. The rest get to be lunch. Each turn, players must choose one of two options: (1) place a tile from their hand onto the board, expanding the dungeon; or (2) move their Hero to an adjacent tile. Many of the the dungeon tiles have an icon that allows players entering that space to take a special action (for example, taking a piece of gold from the dragon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s hoard, stealing gold from another player, or destroying a tile that is already in play). This is the third edition of Drakon, and includes the following updates: plastic miniatures are used for the heroes and the Drakon new tiles are larger (measuring 2.5 by 2.5 inches) and have all new artwork tiles include a combination of rooms from Drakon (2nd Edition) and Drakon Expansion 1 new rules, variants, and player aids are provided each gold piece now has a value between 1 and 3 In the basic game, the first player to earn 10 gold wins the game. Some variants provide different winning conditions. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Size: Medium Standard Information listed on all my For Sale Games: ------------------------------------------------------ 1) Shipping cost is the highest cost of all games purchased + the add on cost of each other game. Promo cards or anything else that fits in a bubble mailer will have a base cost of $5 and and an add on cost of $1, a small game has a base cost of $8 and an add on cost of $2, a medium game has a base cost of $14 and an add on cost of $3 and a large game has a base cost of $20 and add on cost of $4. Anything outside that range will be listed specifically. I am selling this game in order to make room on my shelves for games that might get played more often. Condition --- The box and all game components are in perfect condition. The game has been adult-owned and kept in a non-smoking home. Components --- All game components and manuals are present and are undamaged. Shipping --- I will ship this via USPS in a flat rate box (I think it will fit), to the USA only for $10 (bringing the order total to $70). If you are outside of the US and really want this game, feel free to drop me a GM, and we can discuss it. I only hesitate because I rarely ship out of the country. Free pickup is available if you happen to be in Albuquerque, NM. Payment --- I accept payment through Paypal only. Please do not send payment to my personal email address (the one listed when you make the purchase). I will provide a Paypal address to use when I confirm the sale.
